abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils beat Detroit Red Wings, 4-3; other pro hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Devils had goals on three straight shots midway through the first period, ending Jimmy Howard’s night, and Detroit never caught up.

headline.main: Devils Use Quick Attack to Defeat Red Wings
headline.print_headline: Devils’ Quick Attack Defeats Red Wings; Blues Shut Out Bruins in Boston

snippet: The Devils had goals on three straight shots midway through the first period, ending Jimmy Howard’s night, and Detroit never caught up.
